info.title: Payment Gateway API.

post.description: Thực hiện quá trình giao dịch bằng hình thức Bank Transfer cho user
Thực hiện quá trình giao dịch bằng hình thức Credit Card cho user. Charge thành công tạo ngay một Coupon có giá trị tương đương cho người dùng.

amount.description: Số tiền thực hiện giao dịch, mặc định đơn vị là vnd.

remember_me.description: Yêu cầu có lưu lại thông tin thẻ hay không

select_cus_id.description: Lựa chọn một trong danh sách các thẻ cũ khách hàng đã lưu trước đó.

select_mode_card.description: Lựa chọn của khách hàng sử dụng thẻ cũ hoặc dùng thẻ mới để giao dịch.

get.description: Lấy danh sách tất cả các Credit Card mà user đã lưu ở các giao dịch trước đó

post.description: Xử lý quá trình đăng nhập của user
Xử lý quá trình đăng ký tài khoản của user

Tiếp nhận Receipt từ thiết bị di động, xử lí và trích xuất những thông tin cần thiết dựa vào Transaction Code có trong Receipt
. Nếu Receipt gửi lên hợp lệ, tạo một Coupon có giá trị tương tương cho user tương ứng.

get.description: Lấy thông tin chi tiết của một giao dịch dựa vào id do user cung cấp

post.description: Trả về thông tin lịch sử tất cả các giao dịch hiện có của user

put.description: Giám sát và cập nhật lại trạng thái transaction khi quá thời hạn để được xử lí

get.description: Lấy danh sách tất cả các coupon mà user đang sở hữu
Lấy tất cả những thông tin cơ bản của user

put.description: Cập nhật thông tin cơ bản cho user. Chỉ cho phép thay đổi fullname và phone. Mọi thông tin khác gủi lên chỉ để xác minh user
Thay đổi mật khẩu cho user khi có yêu cầu

Account.title: Account is the resource representing your Stripe account.

AccountAddress.title: Address is the structure for an account address.

town.description:
Town/cho-me. Note that this is only used for Kana/Kanji representations
of an address.

AccountDeclineSettings.title: AccountDeclineSettings is the structure for an account's decline settings.

AccountType.title: AccountType is the type of an account.

AdditionalOwner.title: AdditionalOwner is the structure for an account owner.

ApplicationFee.title: ApplicationFee is the resource representing a Stripe application fee.

BalanceTransaction.title: BalanceTransaction is the resource representing the balance transaction.

BalanceTransactionFee.title: BalanceTransactionFee is a structure that breaks down the fees in a transaction.

BalanceTransactionSource.description:
The Type should indicate which object is fleshed out.
For more details see https://stripe.com/docs/api#retrieve_balance_transaction
BalanceTransactionSource.title: BalanceTransactionSource describes the source of a balance Transaction.

BalanceTransactionSourceType.title: BalanceTransactionSourceType consts represent valid balance transaction sources.

BalanceTransactionStatus.title: BalanceTransactionStatus is the list of allowed values for the balance transaction's status.

BalanceTransactionType.title: BalanceTransactionType is the list of allowed values for the balance transaction's type.

BankAccount.title: BankAccount represents a Stripe bank account.

BankAccountAccountHolderType.title: BankAccountAccountHolderType is the list of allowed values for the bank account holder type.

BankAccountStatus.title: BankAccountStatus is the list of allowed values for the bank account's status.

Card.title: Card is the resource representing a Stripe credit/debit card.

description.description:
Description is a succinct summary of the card's information.

Please note that this field is for internal use only and is not returned
as part of standard API requests.

iin.description:
IIN is the card's "Issuer Identification Number".

Please note that this field is for internal use only and is not returned
as part of standard API requests.

issuer.description:
Issuer is a bank or financial institution that provides the card.

Please note that this field is for internal use only and is not returned
as part of standard API requests.

CardBrand.title: CardBrand is the list of allowed values for the card's brand.

CardFunding.title: CardFunding is the list of allowed values for the card's funding.

CardList.title: CardList is a list object for cards.

CardTokenizationMethod.title: CardTokenizationMethod is the list of allowed values for the card's tokenization method.

CardVerification.title: CardVerification is the list of allowed verification responses.

Charge.title: Charge is the resource representing a Stripe charge.

ChargeFraudStripeReport.title: ChargeFraudStripeReport is the list of allowed values for reporting fraud.

ChargeFraudUserReport.title: ChargeFraudUserReport is the list of allowed values for reporting fraud.

ChargeLevel3.description: This is in private beta and would be empty for most integrations
ChargeLevel3.title: ChargeLevel3 represents the Level III data.

ChargeLevel3LineItem.description: This is in private beta and would be empty for most integrations
ChargeLevel3LineItem.title: ChargeLevel3LineItems represents a line item on level III data.

ChargeOutcome.description:
Outcome is the charge's outcome that details whether a payment
was accepted and why.

ChargeOutcomeRule.title: ChargeOutcomeRule tells you the Radar rule that blocked the charge, if any.

currency.description: Đơn vị tiền tệ của Coupon. Mặc định là vnd

tx_id.description: ID khóa ngoại đến model transaction

Currency.title: Currency is the list of supported currencies.

Customer.title: Customer is the resource representing a Stripe customer.

CustomerShippingDetails.title: CustomerShippingDetails is the structure containing shipping information.

DOB.title: DOB is a structure for an account owner's date of birth.

Discount.title: Discount is the resource representing a Stripe discount.

Dispute.title: Dispute is the resource representing a Stripe dispute.

DisputeEvidence.description:
DisputeEvidence is the structure that contains various details about
the evidence submitted for the dispute.
Almost all fields are strings since there structures (i.e. address)
do not typically get parsed by anyone and are thus presented as-received.

DisputeReason.title: DisputeReason is the list of allowed values for a discount's reason.

DisputeStatus.title: DisputeStatus is the list of allowed values for a discount's status.

EvidenceDetails.description:
EvidenceDetails is the structure representing more details about
the dispute.

ExternalAccount.description:
ExternalAccount is an external account (a bank account or card) that's
attached to an account. It contains fields that will be conditionally
populated depending on its type.

ExternalAccountList.description:
ExternalAccountList is a list of external accounts that may be either bank
accounts or cards.

data.description:
Values contains any external accounts (bank accounts and/or cards)
currently attached to this account.

ExternalAccountType.title: ExternalAccountType is the type of an external account.

FeeRefund.title: FeeRefund is the resource representing a Stripe application fee refund.

FeeRefundList.title: FeeRefundList is a list object for application fee refunds.

FileUpload.title: FileUpload is the resource representing a Stripe file upload.

FileUploadPurpose.title: FileUploadPurpose is the purpose of a particular file upload.

FraudDetails.title: FraudDetails is the structure detailing fraud status.

IdentityVerification.title: IdentityVerification is the structure for an account's verification.

IdentityVerificationDetailsCode.description:
IdentityVerificationDetailsCode is a machine-readable code specifying the
verification state of a legal entity

IdentityVerificationDisabledReason.description: IdentityVerificationDisabledReason describes the valid reason to disable account

IdentityVerificationStatus.title: IdentityVerificationStatus describes the different statuses for identity verification.

Invoice.title: Invoice is the resource representing a Stripe invoice.

InvoiceBilling.title: InvoiceBilling is the type of billing method for this invoice.

InvoiceBillingReason.description: InvoiceBillingReason is the reason why a given invoice was created

InvoiceLine.title: InvoiceLine is the resource representing a Stripe invoice line item.

InvoiceLineList.title: InvoiceLineList is a list object for invoice line items.

InvoiceLineType.title: InvoiceLineType is the list of allowed values for the invoice line's type.

LegalEntity.title: LegalEntity is the structure for properties related to an account's legal state.

LegalEntityType.title: LegalEntityType describes the types for a legal entity.

NullFloat64.description:
NullFloat64 implements the Scanner interface so
it can be used as a scan destination, similar to NullString.
NullFloat64.title: NullFloat64 represents a float64 that may be null.

NullString.title:
NullString represents a string that may be null.
NullString implements the Scanner interface so
it can be used as a scan destination:

NullTime.description:
NullTime represents a time.Time that may be null. NullTime implements the
sql.Scanner interface so it can be used as a scan destination, similar to
sql.NullString.

PaymentSource.description:
The Type should indicate which object is fleshed out (eg. BitcoinReceiver or Card)
For more details see https://stripe.com/docs/api#retrieve_charge
PaymentSource.title: PaymentSource describes the payment source used to make a Charge.

PaymentSourceType.title: PaymentSourceType consts represent valid payment sources.

PayoutSchedule.title: PayoutSchedule is the structure for an account's payout schedule.

Period.title: Period is a structure representing a start and end dates.

Plan.title: Plan is the resource representing a Stripe plan.

PlanBillingScheme.title: PlanBillingScheme is the list of allowed values for a plan's billing scheme.

PlanInterval.title: PlanInterval is the list of allowed values for a plan's interval.

PlanTransformUsage.title: PlanTransformUsage represents the bucket billing configuration.

PlanTransformUsageRound.title: PlanTransformUsageRound is the list of allowed values for a plan's transform usage round logic.

PlanUsageType.title: PlanUsageType is the list of allowed values for a plan's usage type.

Recipient.title: Recipient is the resource representing a Stripe recipient.

RecipientType.title: RecipientType is the list of allowed values for the recipient's type.

Refund.title: Refund is the resource representing a Stripe refund.

RefundList.title: RefundList is a list object for refunds.

RefundReason.description: RefundReason is, if set, the reason the refund is being made

RefundStatus.title: RefundStatus is the status of the refund.

ReversalList.title: ReversalList is a list of object for reversals.

ReviewReasonType.title: ReviewReasonType describes the reason why the review is open or closed.

ShippingDetails.title: ShippingDetails is the structure containing shipping information.

SourceList.title: SourceList is a list object for cards.

Subscription.title: Subscription is the resource representing a Stripe subscription.

SubscriptionBilling.title: SubscriptionBilling is the type of billing method for this subscription's invoices.

SubscriptionItem.title: SubscriptionItem is the resource representing a Stripe subscription item.

SubscriptionItemList.title: SubscriptionItemList is a list of invoice items as retrieved from a list endpoint.

SubscriptionList.title: SubscriptionList is a list object for subscriptions.

SubscriptionStatus.title: SubscriptionStatus is the list of allowed values for the subscription's status.

ThreeDSecure.description:
ThreeDSecure is the resource representing a Stripe 3DS object
For more details see https://stripe.com/docs/api#three_d_secure.

Transfer.title: Transfer is the resource representing a Stripe transfer.

TransferDestination.description:
The Type should indicate which object is fleshed out
For more details see https://stripe.com/docs/api/go#transfer_object
TransferDestination.title: TransferDestination describes the destination of a Transfer.

TransferSourceType.title: TransferSourceType is the list of allowed values for the transfer's source_type field.

email.description: Địa chỉ Email của user có định danh id

fullname.description: Họ và tên do user cung cấp

phone.description: Số điện thoại của user tương ứng

user_id.description: UserID khóa ngoại đến model user

DocReceiveReceiptSuccess.description: Server xử lí yêu cầu thành công

error.description: Something went wrong. please try again

DocResRegister.description: Server xử lí thành công. Lỗi phía người dùng

error.description: Password Not Match | Existing Account | Error establishing a database connection

DocResRegisterSuccess.description: Server xử lí yêu cầu thành công

DocResTxMsg.description: Server xử lí thành công. Lỗi phía người dùng

error.description: Password Not Match | Existing Account | Error establishing a database connection

DocResUserInfo.description: Server xử lí yêu cầu thành công

DocResUserMsg.description: Server xử lí thành công. Lỗi phía người dùng
